items.text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
items.plainText: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

items.text: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;
items.plainText: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;

items.text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;
items.plainText: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;

items.text: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;
items.plainText: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;

items.text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;
items.plainText: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;

items.text: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;
items.plainText: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;

items.text: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;
items.plainText: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;

items.text: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;
items.plainText: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;

items.text: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;
items.plainText: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;

items.text: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;
items.plainText: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;

items.text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:
items.plainText: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:

items.text: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;
items.plainText: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;

items.text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;
items.plainText: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;

items.text: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;
items.plainText: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

items.text: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;
items.plainText: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

items.text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
items.plainText: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

items.text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.
items.plainText: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.

items.text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
items.plainText: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

items.text: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.
items.plainText: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.

items.text: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
items.plainText: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

items.text: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
items.plainText: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

items.text: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
items.plainText: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,

items.text: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
items.plainText: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

items.text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:
items.plainText: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

items.text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
items.plainText: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
